replies.body: I have been experiencing a lot of lag. Not just Avicus but every server I go to and today I just found that it hasn't been my internet that has been bugging me. Does anyone know how to fix this ping lag if you are experiencing it?

replies.body: I usually get 30ms and I'm getting blocks randomly disappearing and me not placing blocks when there should be a block placed. I can't even Breezily Bridge on the server for the most part lately because every time at some point, the server will lag and not place the block and i'll fall off. This is getting really annoying...
